sentence: Magaziner) and the gentleman from  Texas (Mr.
Speaker, I thank Representative Magaziner, Representative Roy,  and others who have been working together for some time on this.
Speaker, I am proud to cosponsor the TRUST in Congress Act, and I  thank Representatives Magaziner and Roy for their leadership on this  critical bipartisan legislation.

I thank Chairman Green; Ranking Member Thompson; my counterpart on  the Subcommittee on Counterterrorism and Intelligence, Ranking Member  Magaziner; and the Committee on Homeland Security staff for moving this  critical legislation forward.
Speaker, I thank Representatives Roy and Magaziner for their  bipartisan leadership on this issue.

I think this is a paramount step in us making sure,  with friends and colleagues like Representative Magaziner, we are able  to move forward and rebuild the trust, the hope, and rebuild this  institution to be what it once was.
Magaziner has been an excellent partner in this effort, and it is  now long overdue.
